Wiki Module¶

The wiki module provides a simple wiki engine with a patch-based history system, a collaborative infinote editor with webworker-based markdown parser and an example plasmoid graph visualization widget. Plans are to extend the wiki with RDF support and a p2p search engine at some point.

leave_hyki_article(client)[source]¶

Remove client page subscription after client left the wiki page or disconnected. This is tracked by signal observers defined in the controller constructor.

Parameters:client (Client) – The requesting client
notify_editors(client, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

After a client replaced the document state with a revision, it sends a request to notify participants

Parameters:
  • client (Client) – The requesting client
  • slug (str) – The wiki slug reference
  • revision (int) – The revision that has been restored
Returns:

dict - Empty response to trigger re-init editor on the client-side

view_hyki_article(client, slug)[source]¶

Infinote client wants to join the subscription log based on the content-id(cid). In this case within the hyki, the client requests the cid from the page-slug, subscribes to the channel and starts sending operation requests out, with the cid included. When the client disconnects(other page view or websocket closes), the client gets unsubscribed from the log.

Parameters:
  • client (Client) – The requesting client
  • slug (str) – The wiki slug reference
Returns:

dict - wiki article state information or html-layout data response
